name: Fairy Cave
description:
Fairy Cave

Fairy Cave is, as the name suggests, a game where you play as a fairy in a cave. The game is a copter-like where you have to avoid the cave rocks while gathering more health to stay in the air. Try to get to the end!

The game was made in 2 days time as part of a game development course. The assignment was to create a game in the style of Copter Classic or Flappy Bird and this is what I came up with.

Please tell me in the comments if you would like to see more of this game, it could perhaps be made into a mobile game. I would also like to hear your feedback on the look and feel of the game.
